title: Large Language Models
description: Most of my research focuses on large language models and their potential applications.

title: Agentic AI
description: I am interested in developing agentic AI systems that can autonomously perform complex tasks, especially in data analysis, research, and education.

title: Multimodal Systems
description: I focus on enhancing language models by integrating multiple modalities, enabling them to interpret, analyze, and generate different types of data.

title: Efficient Language Models
description: I am exploring how to make language models more efficient, scalable, cost-effective, and accurate.

title: Explainable AI
description: My research questions include understanding how deep learning models work, how to automatically analyze their behavior, and how to apply that knowledge effectively.

title: Evaluation
description: I view evaluation as an opportunity to better understand models. It should provide insights and recommendations for improvement, not just performance comparisons.
